root.swedish: S: hej / hur kan jag hjälpa dig U: jag skulle vilja ha hjälp med att välja vilken hund jag skall köpa S: okej / har du funderat på vilka egenskaper som är viktigast U: ja / jag vill gärna ha en väldigt beskyddande hund som är lätt att träna S: okej / och hur skall den vara med / spelar den någon roll hur den är med barn U: det är inte så viktigt S: okej / och lekfullhet är det viktigt U: det är inte heller så viktigt S: okej / då skulle jag föreslå en schäfer eller rottweiler U: okej / hur skiljer sig då här två hundarna i hur lätta dom är att träna då S: ja schäfer är ju lättare att träna U: okej S: med rottweiler är mer beskyddande U: okej / vad svårt / finns det någon annan hund som har högt beskyddande och som är lätta att träna S: ja det skull då vara en boxer U: okej / och vad är det för livslängd på en boxer jämfört med dom andra två S: ja / boxer har lite kortare livslängd U: okej / det är ju lite tråkigt / hur lång livslängd har en schäfer då S: ja / den har lång livslängd U: okej / då kanske vi ska ha en schäfer då S: ja det låter bra
root.english: S: hello / how can I help you U: I would like help choosing which dog to buy S: okay / have you thought about which qualities are most important U: yes / I would like a very protective dog that is easy to train S: okay / and how should it be with / does it matter how it is with children U: it's not that important S: okay / and playfulness is important U: it's not that important either S: okay / then I would suggest a german shepherd or rottweiler U: okay / how do these two dogs differ in how easy they are to train then S: yes / german shepherds are easier to train U: okay S: but rottweilers are more protective U: okay / how hard / is there any other dog that has high protectiveness and is easy to train S: yes / it would then be a boxer U: okay / and what is the lifespan of a boxer compared to the other two S: yes / boxers have a slightly shorter lifespan U: okay / it's a bit sad / how long does a german shepherd have then S: yes / it has a long life U: okay / then maybe we should have a german shepherd then S: yes that sounds good
root.distillation: S: hello / how can I help you U: I would like help choosing which dog to buy S: okay / have you thought about which qualities thatare most important U: yes / I would like a very protective dog that is easy to train S: okay / and how should it be with / does it matter how it is with children U: it's not that important S: okay / and is playfulness is important for your dog U: it's not that important either S: okay / then I would suggest a german shepherd or rottweiler U: okay / how do these two dogs differ in how easy they are to train then S: yes / german shepherds are easier to train than rottweilers U: okay S: but rottweilers are more protective U: okay / how hard / is there any other dog that has high protectiveness and is easy to train S: yes / it would then be a boxer U: okay / and what is the lifespan of a boxer compared to the other two S: yes / boxers have a slightly shorter lifespan U: okay / it's a bit sad / how long does a german shepherd have then S: yes / it has a long life U: okay / then maybe we should have a german shepherd then S: yes that sounds good
root.final: S: hello / how can I help you U: I would like help choosing which dog to buy S: okay / have you thought about which qualities that are most important U: yes / I would like a very protective dog that is easy to train S: okay / does it matter how it is with children U: it's not that important S: okay / is playfulness important for your dog U: it's not that important either S: okay / then I would suggest a german shepherd or rottweiler U: okay / how do these two dogs differ in how easy they are to train then S: yes / german shepherds are easier to train than rottweilers U: okay S: but rottweilers are more protective U: okay / how hard / is there any other dog that has high protectiveness and is easy to train S: yes / a boxer U: okay / and what is the lifespan of a boxer compared to the other two S: boxers have a slightly shorter lifespan U: okay / it's a bit sad / how long does a german shepherd have then S: yes / it has an expected life expectency of 12 years U: okay / then maybe we should have a german shepherd then S: okay
